plot: Comedy set in the future (1923) concerning a man's attempt to obtain and keep the last remaining bottle of champagne, after liquor prohibition had been established throughout the world.
title: The Last Bottle
plot_es: Comedy set in the future (1923) concerning a man's attempt to obtain and keep the last remaining bottle of champagne, after liquor prohibition had been established throughout the world.
plot_en: Comedy set in the future (1923) concerning a man's attempt to obtain and keep the last remaining bottle of champagne, after liquor prohibition had been established throughout the world.
